scripts.link: lerna bootstrap && cd packages/aeproject-cli && yarn link
scripts.develop: lerna bootstrap && cd packages/aeproject-cli && yarn link && cd .. && cd aeproject-config && npm install && yarn link && cd .. && cd aeproject-logger && npm install && yarn link && cd .. && cd aeproject-utils && npm install && yarn link && cd .. && cd aeproject-lib && npm install && yarn link && yarn link aeproject-config && yarn link aeproject-logger && yarn link aeproject-utils
scripts.unlink: cd packages/aeproject-cli && yarn unlink && cd .. && cd aeproject-lib && yarn unlink && yarn unlink aeproject-config && yarn unlink aeproject-utils && yarn unlink aeproject-logger && cd .. && cd aeproject-config && yarn unlink && cd .. && cd aeproject-logger && yarn unlink && cd .. && cd aeproject-utils && yarn unlink
